name: ice-heal
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Cures freezing.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A spray-type medicine for freezing. It can be used once to defrost a Pokémon that has been frozen solid.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A spray-type medicine for freezing. It can be used once to defrost a Pokémon that has been frozen solid.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A spray-type medicine for treating freezing. It can be used to thaw out a single Pokémon that has been frozen solid.
